articles.title: Piers Morgan shares note from mysterious Downing Street source found stuck to windscreen - Mirror Online
articles.description: Good Morning Britain presenter Piers Morgan has taken to Twitter to share a mysterious note that he found stuck on his car windscreen, which claimed to be from a Downing Street source
articles.content:
Television journalist Piers Morgan has shared a mysterious note he found stuck on his car windscreen.
